lender.name: Anung
lender.loan_because: I am in dire need of capital for current business in my country is experiencing a crisis and bad for any field of business development
lender.occupational_info: I was originally a creative disebuah Production House but because of late entertain the field conditions were experienced ups and downs, so many employees that Freeland had to stop working. salahsatunya me. for that I intend to establish a small field of food trade, but I collided with the ability pemodalan was to sacara chance my wife has plenty of experience in this respect. As for the food that will become a mainstay of the products go round with fried beans taste different. for that I am in dire need of capital ranges from us $ 1500

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I have been given so many gifts in my life that I would like to give back! Also, I feel that this type of loan organization is the way to go! It is a beautiful thing and I feel proud to be part of it!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a teacher and healer of The Reconnection. This work can bring about healing and transformation in everyone's life at all levels: physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual. I also teach children from 4 - 14 years old how to do this work so that their lives can be positively impacted from a very early age!

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I was privileged to go to Mexico in 1999 with Holy Savior Lutheran Church on my first Mission trip. I've went two times since then. God has blessed my life so I may bless others. I really do have a heart for Africa. Oh, so many reasons...so little space.

lender.name: William and Jean
lender.loan_because: Although William and Jean are gone, Bill's Kiva account will give on and be re-lent forever in their names. I miss you Bill and Jean. -- Kaas Baichtal (their daughter-in-law)

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: As a business woman, I have been helped by others, so I would like to pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: I am a free lance floral designer who enjoys working with other business owners and contribute to their success.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I believe self sufficiency is key to making the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: a blessing.

lender.name: Tiffany

lender.occupational_info: Founder of Yoga Roots & Healing Arts

lender.name: Ayanna
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that I can make a difference.

lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I've been thinking about doing this for some time and just now got around to it. I'm an entrepreneur at heart so I wanted to help.
lender.occupational_info: Most recently I was in sales for a window company so I was responsible for educating people on different features and benefits of windows and how they help to insulate and beautify their homes.

lender.name: Chelsea Clarey
lender.loan_because: I believe that the means of production should be placed in the hands of the workers. I guess that makes me a passive-aggressive Marxist.
lender.occupational_info: I design and make bead-and-wire jewelry, which I sell on the Internet and to friends. I'm also a freelance copywriter; I help other small businesses and individuals write profiles, press releases and other kinds of text. I work at a technical college helping students learn English grammar and formal essay writing.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: Developing a way for an individual, a family, or small business to create honest cash flow is better than working for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I develop 'strategic plans" with organizations and "life plan" with individuals. I then help them accomplish their goals through regular plan review sessions.

lender.name: Xochilt
lender.loan_because: Everything we do should be a result of our gratitude for what God has done for us.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: microfinance is one of the few development schemes that actually work. It gets money directly into the hands of the individuals who need it most.
lender.occupational_info: Currently a student.

lender.occupational_info: I am from the United States, now a student in Canada, studying the things that insects learn. Their brains are very similar to ours.

lender.occupational_info: I make jewelry!

lender.occupational_info: I am a nerd, what I do to earn my money is not as important as what I do with that money.

lender.occupational_info: Semi-retired from AUS Army and a student.

lender.occupational_info: Currently I am a student working on become a teacher. I am also an aspiring musician.

lender.name: Axel
lender.loan_because:
... I can. "If you're not part of the solution, you're part of the problem"
It's up to us to make this a better place - these people need that little financial boost more then we do - if it were the other way, i'd like to think someone would help us as well... We need to learn to share the world and its resources with everyone on it.
I'm fed up with the way our world leaders run this little planet of ours... there has to be a better way, a better future for us and our children - Kiva is one of the easiest ways just about anyone can make a difference, and create potential for a better world. ...
